snippet: The top court in international sports expects to take about four months to rule on the Japanese hammer thrower Koji Murofushi’s bid to become an International Olympic Committee member.
lead_paragraph: The top court in international sports expects to take about four months to rule on the Japanese hammer thrower Koji Murofushi’s bid to become an International Olympic Committee member.

headline.seo: Awaiting I.O.C. Election Ruling on Japanese hammer thrower
headline.main: Awaiting I.O.C. Election Ruling on Japanese hammer thrower
